full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` RTA MGRIN BADZRA DPAL BZANG PO'I YANG SPRUL MYUR BYON GSOL 'DEBS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES SRID ZHI'I GTZUG SKYABS MGON RDO RJE'I 'CHANG MI YI GER RNAMS ROL PA RGYAL KHANG RTZE BA'I SKU 'PHRIN BRGYAD PA RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYAL MTSAN RTA MGRIN BADZRA DPAL BZANG PO'I YANG SPRUL MYUR GSOL 'DEBS 'DI NI, MKHAN PO PHYAG MDZAD PA, T'A BLA MA SOGS SER SKYA THUN MONGS NAS BSKUL NGOR, DGON PO 'DI'I BKA' DRIN @004B GYIS NYE BAR 'TSOL SLOB MA SPRUL MING BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYI BRIS PA DZA YANTU,, ,,)
